name.en: 第5聖所「要塞都市埃裡都近郊」
name.jp: 第5聖所「要塞都市埃裡都近郊」
name.thai: 第5聖所「要塞都市埃裡都近郊」
name.ko: 第5聖所「要塞都市埃裡都近郊」
name.zh_tw: 第5聖所「要塞都市埃裡都近郊」
name.zh_cn_jp: 第5圣所「要塞都市埃里都近郊」
name.zh_cn_tw: 第5圣所「要塞都市埃里都近郊」
name.zh_cn_cn: 第5圣所「要塞都市埃里都近郊」

desc.en: 研討會的成員為了攻略第5聖所而聚集在要塞都市埃裡都近郊。溫泉開發部一方面支援攻略聖所，同時也為了尋找新的溫泉而四處奔波。
desc.jp: 研討會的成員為了攻略第5聖所而聚集在要塞都市埃裡都近郊。溫泉開發部一方面支援攻略聖所，同時也為了尋找新的溫泉而四處奔波。

desc.zh_cn_jp: 研讨会的成员为了攻略第5圣所而聚集在要塞都市埃里都近郊。温泉开发部一方面支持攻略圣所，同时也为了寻找新的温泉而四处奔波。

desc.en: 雖然已經破解了安全系統，但是在引誘霍德的過程中還需要破解其他的安全系統。因而小雪雖很不願意，但還是加入了戰鬥。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.thai:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.ko:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。
desc.zh_tw:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
